name: NOOB THE CUBE!
description:
one day noob and glue the cubes were having a wonderful day

until doom the cube came and kidnapped glue

and noob must go threw spiders and spikes to get back glue!

CONTROLS

arrow keys!

game by nate!

shoutout zalay for additional art!

big thanks to milky and onion room for letting me use their amazing music!
